channel.title: Rotifest Authentic Trinidadian Cuisine
channel.description: Recent content on Rotifest Authentic Trinidadian Cuisine

item.title: Doubles
item.description: Doubles is made with two Baras topped with curried Channa and served with toppings like pepper, tamarind sweet sauce, and cucumber relish.

item.title: Glossary of Trini Foods
item.description: Doubles is made with two baras topped with curried channa and served with toppings like pepper, tamarind sweet sauce, and cucumber relish.

item.title: Saheena
item.description: Saheena is a Trini specialty consisting of flour, split peas powder, saffron, baking powder, and salt. The ingredients are mixed together into a paste which is then placed on taro leaves.

item.title: Tomatoes Choka
item.description: Bake is a fried dough of unleavened bread, usually served with Tomatoes choka.
